snippet: Tom Brady, the New England star quarterback, put to rest worries about his knee in a victory over the Tampa Bay Buccaneers on Friday night.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New England Patriots beat Tampa Bay Buccaneers, 25-21, in exhibition game; Patriots quarterback Tom Brady throws 11 straight completions, putting to rest worries about his knee; other scores and football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady, the New England star quarterback, put to rest worries about his knee in a victory over the Tampa Bay Buccaneers on Friday night.

headline.main: 11 Straight Completions Calm Fears About Brady
headline.print_headline: 11 Straight Completions Calm Fears About Brady
